title: Lu's Time - Season 1 (League of Legends Anime)(Eng Sub)[OK]
description:
This is a Chinese Anime for (and about) League of Legends players-fans, it's extremely funny!!!

This is season 1, all 14 episodes, the duration of the episodes is very short... 7 to 10 minutes each.

Credits for English Subtitles to: Edward Liu & Kelvin

There are external subtitles for episode 14 since the original file's subtitles had problems ;-)

=====================================================

Summary (by brabroke):
"The animation was made by Penta Studio, average speed is around 1 episode every 3 weeks. Currently progresed at season 2.

The story revolves around Team KDY, a amateur team formed by a group of friends in university. Include friendship, romance, past trauma but mostly fan-service...(and shit lots of yaoi...as requested by female fans) "

=====================================================

fansubbing-translation notes (by brabroke):

Subbing this show is VERY HARD because the amount of chinese pop-culture refrences (and some of them I dont even get it). And insane amount of Chinese PUNS. Even the shows name and the studio name is a pun. Penta is the Chinese prounceation for flaming at them, and the title lu, was a corrupted version of the letter l, which means fap. It was a trend caused by a joke in an early lol rant video by a oc called xiaodong, in which he prouced LoL in a corrupted accent, resulted the rise of the "fapper". The correct translation for the title is actually "Era of LoL"
